I joined my colleagues to introduce the Locking Up Robocallers Act of 2019. This bipartisan bill cracks down on robocalls & is something we can all support. I look forward to getting this legislation passed into law and finally put an end to these scams. https://kustoff.house.gov/media/press-releases/kustoff-introduces-another-bipartisan-bill-crack-down-robocall-violators …

I introduced the TRACED Act because it will crack down on illegal robocalls by requiring caller authentication, and it will increase penalties for placing these calls-finally holding these scammers accountable. https://twitter.com/TonyRomm/status/1140968819848036352 …
